action.description: The entity action type to execute on the target entity.
action.markdownDescription: The entity action type to execute on the target entity.

type.description:
## Target Action

---



[Bi-entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/target_action)

Executes an [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/target_action) on the target entity.

Type ID: `origins:target_action`




---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_action": {
    "type": "origins:target_action",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:set_on_fire",
        "duration": 5
    }
}
```

This example will set the target entity on fire for 5 seconds.
